text: The African Men's Olympic Qualifiers was held to determine the African national teams for under 23 that will participate at the 2004 Summer Olympics football tournament held in Athens. ==Preliminary round== |} :' Both withdrew. \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==First round== |} :' Tunisia bye after both Benin and Equatorial Guinea withdrew. \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Second round== ===Group A=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group C=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group D=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- == References == Category:Football qualification for the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Football at the Summer Olympics – Men's African Qualifiers
title: Football at the 2004 Summer Olympics – Men's African Qualifiers
